data.name: Dogs Organized Neatly
data.detailed_description:
PLEASE WISHLIST OUR UPCOMING GAME üôè

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1597720/Feed_All_Monsters/


About the Game

‚ÄúA true friend leaves paw prints on your heart.‚Äù

And we have 30 friends just waiting for you to pet them! Our good boys and girls come in all shapes and sizes.


However, they are way too energetic for us to handle alone so we need YOUR help to organize all these doggos!
Just pick them up and place them on the grid over there.
And don‚Äôt worry if you rotate them a bit, they may bark, but they never bite.



KEY FEATURES

  • Dogs
    30 brand-new & unique hand-drawn dogs for you to befriend, collect and organize (neatly).
  • Handcrafted Levels
    80 brand-new handcrafted levels, which will tickle your brain.
  • Simple Controls
    Play by just clicking the left and right mouse buttons: an accessible experience for newcomers or seasoned puzzlers of any age.
  • Relaxing Music
    Dogs Organized Neatly has relaxing background music! Pretend you are dog sitting your favourite puppers or spending a relaxed afternoon with your best furry friend.

data.short_description: In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange lovely doggos in a way that fits the grid. Dogs Organized Neatly comes with 80 brand-new hand-crafted levels and a whole bunch of dogs in all shapes and sizes.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Japanese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Polish, Russian, French, Norwegian, Finnish, Swedish, Czech, Dutch, Ukrainian, Turkish, Arabic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (or Higher)
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
